original_title: 陰キャでいじめられてる僕に初めてかわいい彼女ができたが、僕のせいで今度は彼女が標的にされてしまった　吉岡ひより
overview: I got a girlfriend for the first time because I was bullied in class because I was a shy person. Mr. Yoshioka, who I have liked for a long time. I was going to graduate without telling him how I felt, but surprisingly, she confessed to me! I was worried that I might get bullied because of dating me, but Mr. Yoshioka said, "I look like this, but I'm strong enough to participate in the Kanto tournament in the kendo club, so it's okay! Rather, I'll protect you from now on." It's been rock bottom until now, but I have a feeling that a happy youth is about to begin!
title: I’m Being Bullied secretly, I’ve Got My First Cute Girlfriend, But Now She’s a Target Because of Me – Hiyori Yoshioka
